data.title: Penn Badgley Stopped Using Alcohol & Drugs While Dating Blake Lively: It 'Saved' Me
data.meta_description: Penn Bagdley and Blake Lively dated from 2007 to 2010 on the set of 'Gossip Girl'.
data.text:
